report.title: Long Night
report.author: Hank the Hustler
report.bodytext: It was my birthday. I was excited to be going out to one of my favorite dance clubs. I was very much in a great frame of mind; very happy and content. /n /n I consider myself an experienced (about 7 years) user of MDMA. I have used GHB, Crystal Meth, and Ketamine for about 1 year. It was my third experience with 2C-T-7. The previous 2 experiences were very good, but they involved using 2CT7 without any other substances. /n /n The night was going very well using MDMA and GHB. I was dancing alot and enjoying myself immensely. After the club closed, my friends and I went to an after party. There, I decided to do 2CT7. I had tried 2CT7 twice before by itself and had glowing experiences. I was curious to see how 2CT7 would be in combination with other drugs. /n /n About 1 hour after I took the 2CT7 orally, I began to 'ramp up' and feel excited. At this point I began to see some visual effects and definite color enhancement. I had taken a dose of GHB approximately 30 minutes prior to taking the 2CT7. After about 2 hours of taking the 2CT7, I began to get slightly disoriented and extremely nauseated. I should note that I almost never vomit when taking drugs: until that moment. I proceeded to vomit and dry-heave for approximately 1 hour after that point. /n /n I think my friends were getting bit concerned with me at that point and took me home. We then sat around my place for a few hours. I was well into the trip at that point. I was seeing visual effects such as tracers, closed-eye visuals, and color enhancement. I was still unable to keep anything in my stomach during this period. /n /n I was feeling very agitated during this period also. I was getting a bit frightened because my pulse was getting a bit rapid and I was getting very dehydrated. I was also seeing images and hearing sounds that were not actually present. I was getting very tired at this point as it had been a long night of partying. I basically wanted the trip be over at this point, but I knew I was only about half-way though at this point. I just kept telling myself that I had taken a lot of drugs and eventually it would end. /n /n My friends were snorting ketamine during this time, so I thought some K might help to relax me. I snorted about 5 bumps of K in about 30 minutes. The K changed the trip. It was hard to explain, but I was now hallucinating in pools. This was cool, but failed to relax me. /n /n I decided at that point just to ride out the trip without any other drugs. Gradually, I was able to drink some water and my pulse became normal. About 8 hours after I took the 2CT7, I started to come down. /n /n Overall, the experience wasn't all that bad; except for the nausea. I think the GHB in combination with the 2CT7 caused the vomiting. I definitely won't do those 2 in combination again. The ketamine mixed with 2CT7 was pretty cool, though. /n /n I wouldn't recommend doing all of these drugs in combination. I think 2CT7 is a drug best enjoyed by itself (or maybe with some K) during a time when you can devote 12 hours to the experience.
